Name: PS_Interface
Comment: PS Interface via File or COM or UDP or SN.

Name: ZOOM_FACTOR
Comment: Zooming factor of draws.(1000 for 50 meter or 100 for 5 meter)

Name: ROTATE_FACTOR
Comment: Rotate factor of draws for 45.0 or 135.0 or 225.0 or 315.0

Name: MIRROR_ENABLE
Comment: Mirroring or not.(true or false)

Name: #Possible ROTATE_FACTOR and MIRROR_ENABLE options for sensor direction

Comment: Rotate factor of draws for 45.0 or 135.0 or 225.0 or 315.0

Name: #MIRROR_ENABLE
Comment: Mirroring or not.(true or false)

Name: #ROTATE_FACTOR
Comment: Rotate factor of draws for 45.0 or 135.0 or 225.0 or 315.0

Comment: Mirroring or not.(true or false)

Name: #ROTATE_FACTOR
Comment: Rotate factor of draws for 45.0 or 135.0 or 225.0 or 315.0

Name: #MIRROR_ENABLE
Comment: Mirroring or not.(true or false)

Name: #ROTATE_FACTOR
Comment: Rotate factor of draws for 45.0 or 135.0 or 225.0 or 315.0

Name: #MIRROR_ENABLE

Name: SCREEN_OFFSET_X
Comment: X Offset of screen to draw.

Name: SCREEN_OFFSET_Y
Comment: Y Offset of screen to draw.

Name: FILE_name
Comment: File name of PS Interface File.

Name: UART_port_name
Comment: UART port name of PS Interface UART.

Name: UART_baud_rate
Comment: UART baud rate of PS Interface UART.

Name: UART_parity
Comment: UART parity of PS Interface UART.

Name: UART_data_bits
Comment: UART baud rate of PS Interface UART.

Name: UART_stop_bits
Comment: UART stop bits of PS Interface UART.

Name: UDP_remote_ip
Comment: UDP remote IP of PS Interface UDP.

Name: UDP_remote_port
Comment: UDP remote port of PS Interface UDP.

Name: UDP_local_port
Comment: UDP local port of PS Interface UDP.

Name: SN_serial_number
Comment: Serial Number of PS Interface SN.
